title: Amend a Uk Savings Account Request
description: Amend a Uk Savings Account Request

incomeSourceId.description:
The unique identifier of the savings account. 

Must conform to the regular expression
^[A-Za-z0-9]{15}$

taxedUkInterest.description: Total net taxed interest for the specified savings account. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

untaxedUkInterest.description: Total untaxed interest for the specified savings account. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
